name: gamba
description: 1. User visits a website 2. Check mode     * AI mode:         * Frontend extracts HTML and preprocesses $[1]$ it     * Malware mode:         * If it isn't in the whitelist:             * Frontend extracts scripts and preprocesses $[2]$ them     * Both:         * Frontend extracts HTML and preprocesses $[1]$ it         * If it isn't in the whitelist:             * Frontend extracts scripts and preprocesses $[2]$ them 4.  Frontend sends html to Backend to receive `html_response` $_[3]$ 5.  Frontend sends scripts to Backend to receive `scripts_response` $_[4]$ 6.  Frontend accepts feedback from the users $_[5]$
